Get the SimplyBook Chatbot To Let Your Customers Book, Reschedule, and Cancel Appointments Anytime
Effortless Appointment Management at Your Fingertips — Launch the SimplyBook Chatbot on Website, Landing Page, Telegram, WhatsApp, and more.
About
Use cases
Platform
Key Features
SimplyBook.me is an efficient online booking system that simplifies business appointment scheduling. With the integration of BotPenguin, customers now have a seamless interface to book, reschedule, and cancel appointments effortlessly. The integration also enables customers to conveniently make online booking payments and provides the convenience of viewing their tickets.
With BotPenguin's integration, SimplyBook.me enhances the user experience by streamlining the entire appointment management process, making it easier for businesses and customers alike.
A Chatbot That Speaks Many Languages
Expand Your Reach with a Multilingual Chatbot. Serve a global audience, enhance user experience, and boost bookings by conversing in customers' preferred languages.
40+ Ready-To-Use Chatbot Templates
Enhance your booking experience with Chatbot Integration for SimplyBook, featuring 40+ business-ready templates for various industries, including restaurants, salons, and hospitals.
Start Your Chatbot Business

Frequently Asked Questions
How does SimplyBook work?
SimplyBook is an online booking system that lets businesses offer their clients a way to schedule appointments via desktop or mobile devices. Clients can choose an available timeslot, book, and receive a confirmation message.
Does SimplyBook provide a chatbot?
SimplyBook doesn’t provide a native chatbot. However, Simplybook.me does offer various integrations with external chatbots like Facebook Messenger and Telegram.
How does the SimplyBook.me BotPenguin Integration work?
BotPenguin connects the chatbot's API with Simplybook.me API to bring in robot capabilities, allowing clients to book appointments with the chatbot interface.
Does SimplyBook.me offers AI capabilities?
No, SimplyBook.me doesn’t have any AI capabilities. It is simply an online booking platform.
Can you integrate a chatbot with the SimplyBook booking platform?
You can integrate BotPenguin’s chatbot with SimplyBook.me booking system. This integration would allow your customers to book appointments through the chatbot Interface.
What type of service-based businesses can use chatbot SimplyBook integration?
Service-based businesses in various sectors, including beauty, education, child care, public and retail, medical and health, personal services, sports, events, and more, can utilize Chatbot-SimplyBook integration.
What payment methods are used by Simply Book Me Chatbot Integration?
BotPenguin's SimplyBook Chatbot sends payment links within chats, creating a seamless online booking experience for streamlines booking tickets, memberships, subscriptions, and classes. Payments are securely processed by PCI DSS-compliant partners like Stripe, PayPal, PayFort, Mollie, and Adyen, ensuring customer peace of mind while using the chatbot.
Does SimplyBook.me have an app?
Yes, SimplyBook.me has a mobile app available for iOS and Android devices. Users can manage appointments and bookings, view and manage schedules, and use business tools such as customer management and billing features. The app can be downloaded from the App Store or Google Play Store.
